extDesc.message: Allows youtube videos to be opened in a popup (without changing pages)
extDesc.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.

signInNotificationText.message: Would you like to give InstantView access to your YouTube account for subscribing to channels and rating videos?
signInNotificationText.description: The text shown in the first-time notification asking if you want to give InstantView access to your account.

signInNotificationText_Accept.description: The text shown on the 'accept' button.

signInNotificationText_Deny.description: The text shown on the 'deny' button.

signInNotificationText_DontShow.description: The text shown on the 'don't show' button.

authAccepted.message: You can now subscribe to channels and rate videos!
authAccepted.description: Text shown in the notification when the user gives account access.

authDenied.message: You must sign into your account in the options page before rating and subscribing.
authDenied.description: Text shown in the notification when the user denies account access.

identityDenied.message: InstantView needs the "identity" permission to rate videos and subscribe to channels.
identityDenied.description: Text shown in the notification if the identity permission is denied.

thresholdWait.message: Please wait {1} more {2} to subscribe or rate again.
thresholdWait.description: Text shown in the notification when the user tries to rate or subscribe too quickly after a previous request.

retrieveDataFail_Video.description: Text shown in the notification when video data cannot be retrieved.

retrieveDataFail_Channel.description: Text shown in the notification when channel data cannot be retrieved.

retrieveDataFail_Comment.description: Text shown in the notification when comment data cannot be retrieved.

subscriptionAdded.description: Text shown when a channel is successfully subscribed to.

subscriptionRemoved.description: Text shown when a channel is successfully unsubscribed from.

subscribeError.message: An error occurred while trying to subscribe. Please try again later.
subscribeError.description: Text shown when a subscribe error occurs.

unsubscribeError.message: An error occurred while trying to unsubscribe. Please try again later.
unsubscribeError.description: Text shown when an unsubscribe error occurs.

likeSuccess.description: Text shown when a 'like' rating request is successful.

dislikeSuccess.description: Text shown when a 'dislike' rating request is successful.

removeRatingSuccess.description: Text shown when a 'none' rating request is successful.

ratingError.message: An error occurred while trying to rate the video. Please try again later.
ratingError.description: Text shown when a rating error occurs.
